title: Work with European Football League Data
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(ussie) ## get the Spanish league data in a standard format uss_make_matches(engsoccerdata::spain, "Spain") #> # A tibble: 23,915 × 8 #>    country tier  season date       home         visitor goals_home goals_visitor #>    <chr>   <fct>  <int> <date>     <chr>        <chr>        <int>         <int> #>  1 Spain   1       1928 1929-02-10 Arenas de G… Atleti…          2             3 #>  2 Spain   1       1928 1929-02-10 Espanyol Ba… Real U…          3             2 #>  3 Spain   1       1928 1929-02-10 Real Madrid  CE Eur…          5             0 #>  4 Spain   1       1928 1929-02-10 Real Socied… Athlet…          1             1 #>  5 Spain   1       1928 1929-02-12 Racing Sant… FC Bar…          0             2 #>  6 Spain   1       1928 1929-02-17 FC Barcelona Real M…          1             2 #>  7 Spain   1       1928 1929-02-17 Athletic Bi… Espany…          9             0 #>  8 Spain   1       1928 1929-02-17 Atletico Ma… Real S…          0             3 #>  9 Spain   1       1928 1929-02-17 Real Union   Racing…          3             1 #> 10 Spain   1       1928 1929-02-17 CE Europa    Arenas…          5             2 #> # … with 23,905 more rows
